title: Samurai armour

properties.name: description
properties.value: Samurai armour can be obtained as a master clue scroll reward from Treasure Trails.

content:
A player wearing samurai armour.

Samurai armour can be obtained as a master clue scroll reward from Treasure Trails.

Equipping the samurai outfit requires level 35 in Defence. It has bonuses comparable to adamant armour, but with positive magic defence.

The samurai armour pairs well with the Katana aesthetically and thematically.
